Some of the Essenian Crest refugees have resettled in Highwatch, and one of them wishes to meet you.

His name is Loomey, and he needs your help with something.[Finish this quest to obtain a Partner.]

! I heard what happened at Tria.

I went to the Timeless Woods to see if my friends were safe, but failed to save all of them.

But thanks to the goddess, I was able to secure this egg.

There's a problem, though. It's... well, take a look for yourself.

This companion egg was just about to hatch, but it suddenly stopped and turned cold. Perhaps it's failed to adapt to this new environment.

I want to try a spell on it. Will you help me?"What can I do?"

We'll need some specialized energy for the spell.

My partner will tell you the details.

We need both Legacy Essence and Forest Essence for the spell.

Hmm...I know that the Sickly Warthogs in Timeless Woods are full of Forest Essenceâ€”at least, they were before being corrupted by the amber powder.

Please end their suffering and gather as much Forest Essence as you can.
You've got them all! Thank you!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"It was my pleasure."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

You can collect Legacy Essence from various monsters, but it's rare.

We'll need a Legacy Essence for the spell.
(Legacy Essence can be obtained at random from level 65 or higher monsters.)
You can get Forest Essence from Sickly Warthogs in Timeless Woods.

...and it's done! We're all set!

Please tell Loomey that we're ready.

You've got all the materials!

I hope we can save this egg!

It's been years since anybody's tried to use this spell.

Haha, thanks! It's always an honor to see a new companion hatch.

Do you feel that? I think it likes you! You two should travel together."I would be delighted!"

Having a Partner won't be a burden at all. It'll be at your side, aid you with a skill now and then, and all they ever ask for are toys and items you don't need from your inventory.

I wish the two of you the best of luck in your adventures.
